name: baseflow
description: Optimized liquidity routing for the Base ecosystem

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && forge install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../sdk/js && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:sdk
scripts.lint: cd contracts && forge fmt --check && cd ../backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
